titleInfo.title: RELATING TO EFFORTS TO RESPOND TO THE FAMINE IN SOUTH SUDAN

extension.searchTitle: RELATING TO EFFORTS TO RESPOND TO THE FAMINE IN SOUTH SUDAN; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 70

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the resolution, as amended, was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Relating to efforts to respond to the famine in South Sudan
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H. Res. 187, amended, relating to efforts to respond to the famine in South Sudan, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 411 yeas to 2 nays, Roll No. 222.

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Aviation Employee Screening and Security Enhancement Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 876, amended, to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to reform programs of the Transportation Security Administration, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 409 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 223;
